      • obtain

        public EntityModel obtain(EntityModel.ModelType type,
                          float x,
                          float y)
        Obtains a new model of the type defined and with the position already set.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of model to obtain.
        x - The x coordinate of the object to obtain (meters).
        y - The y coordinate of the object to obtain (meters).
        Returns:
        A model of the type defined and with the position already set.

      • obtain

        public com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Array<EntityModel> obtain(EntityModel.ModelType type,
                                                        int numberOfObjects)
        Obtains an array with multiple models of a type. If the pool of the desired type is currently full, it returns an array containing another random model.
        Parameters:
        type - The preferential type of model to return
        numberOfObjects - The number of models to obtain
        Returns:
        An array with numberOfObjects models.
